description: A stylishly designed Penthouse is available with 516 square feet of space and at a price of Rs 25,00,000 which is quite affordable. You will get 3 bedroom at the penthouse along with 2 bathrooms as well and 1 parking making it suitable for a small family, working bachelors. The prime location of Goregaon West in Mumbai is a key feature for the property since it is located close to public transportation in a safe & secure neighborhood. This is a garden facing penthouse with a nice view on the 4th floor of a 6 storied building and is 10+ years old while being semi-furnished. Community amenities include a cycling cum jogging track, playing zone for children, large green zone and 24 hour security.

description: Enjoy buying spacious 870 square feet penthouse in a prime location at a competitive price of Rs 48,00,00,009. Residents will enjoy 4 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms and 2 parking facility at this property, making it suitable for family. The property lies close to public transportation in Sector 45, one of Gurgaon's poshest localities. This stylishly designed property faces the north west while being 5-7 years old and lies on the 10th floor of a 20 storied building. It is a furnished unit. Amenities available in this penthouse includes 24-hour security services, playing zones for children, power backup and more.

description: You can snap up this beautifully designed penthouse with 1730 square feet in terms of area, at a breakthrough price of Rs 18,50,000. This well-ventilated penthouse comes with 2.5 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and 1 parking facility, being ideal for a family. The prime location of sector 100, Noida is a big plus point for this property since it is close to public transportation. 2-4 years old, this property faces the west while offering a nice view to residents on the 14th floor of a 21 storied building. It is furnished for maximum comfort. You can expect power backup and 24 hour security services for the penthouse along with medical facilities.

keywords: spacious, luxurious, well-ventilated, gated community, safe & secure

description: This spacious and luxurious penthouse is available for a competitive price of Rs 1,00,067 with area of 1650 Square Feet. The well-ventilated and stylishly designed property comes with 5 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms and 2 parking slots, making it a great option for families. The property is part of a well-known gated community in a safe & secure neighborhood at the rapidly growing Sector 102 in Gurgaon. The semi-furnished penthouse faces east and is 2-4 years old while being housed on the 5th floor in a 16 floor building. There are plenty of amenities at the project including a badminton court, 24-hour security, attached market, daycare center, club house, gymnasium, indoor games, power backup, squash court, swimming pool, tennis court and more.
